core.summary: 90-second clip on futuristic ball sport with rollerblade athletes, dramatic hip hop/classical music.

objectives: Create a 90-second video clip featuring a futuristic ball sport with rollerblade athletes.
constraints: The clip should have a dramatic tone.
Music should be a blend of hip hop and classical genres.

brief.primary_objective: Create a 90-second video clip featuring a futuristic ball sport with rollerblade athletes.
constraints: The clip should have a dramatic tone.
Music should be a blend of hip hop and classical genres.
